A4.text: It stars Joaquin Phoenix as Cash

A5.text: It stars Reese Witherspoon as Carter

A6.text: Phoenix co-starred alongside Reese Witherspoon in the James Mangold directed film Walk the Line, a Johnny Cash biopic.

A7.text: All of Cash's vocal tracks in the film and on the accompanying soundtrack are played and sung by Phoenix.

A8.text: She won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress â€“ Motion Picture Comedy or Musical, the SAG Award for Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Leading Role, the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role, and the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as June Carter in the film Walk the Line (2005).

A9.text: Witherspoon performed her own vocals in the film, and her songs had to be performed in front of a live audience; she was so worried about needing to perform that she asked her lawyer to terminate the film contract.
